# ðŸ”§ Railway Environment Variables
# Copy these into Railway Variables tab:

SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE=prod
JWT_SECRET=lms-super-secret-jwt-key-2024-production
FRONTEND_URL=https://yourdomain.com

# Optional (if you added PostgreSQL database):
# These will be auto-generated by Railway if you added a PostgreSQL service
# DATABASE_URL=postgresql://username:password@host:port/database
# DB_USERNAME=auto-generated
# DB_PASSWORD=auto-generated

# Email settings (optional for now):
# SMTP_HOST=smtp.gmail.com
# SMTP_PORT=587
# SMTP_USERNAME=your-email@gmail.com
# SMTP_PASSWORD=your-app-password
